Jeff

Hi everyone,
Sold a bunch of postcards last week and got through a bunch of PM's. If I missed anyone let me know. Opening this thread back up for sales, shoot me a PM if you see something of interest! Just check out the first post for a link to the goodies!
Jeff
pm sent

Jeff: Thanks for the Yencer Weidensaul postcard. Got here a couple of days ago. Who, you might ask, the heck was Yencer Weidensaul? He had a middling minor league career of about a decade's duration; he looks more like a bookkeeper than a rugged deadballer. Yencer (or Yancer or Yenser or Yentzer or Genser or whatever else) was a college teammate of Christy Mathewson. According to the appended death notice he was also Matty's cousin. I have a 1902 Bucknell yearbook and his name kept popping up: captain of the baseball team, business manager of the school paper, Sigma Chi frat boy. In my fantasy world where I've cobbled together cardboard and memories of a visit to Lewisburg following a National in Baltimore some years back this postcard fits in perfectly.

1907 Toronto Maple Leafs
[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/kawika_o_ka_pakipika/sportscardsetc/mischidden/christymathewsonbucknell/large/1907%20Yenser%20Weidensaul%20RPPC.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/kawika_o_ka_pakipika/sportscardsetc/mischidden/christymathewsonbucknell/huge/Baseball%201.jpg[/IMG]

If I'm not mistaken YW is front-row, second from left
[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/kawika_o_ka_pakipika/sportscardsetc/mischidden/christymathewsonbucknell/large/Baseball%202.jpg[/IMG]

Matty's "view" from his gravesite
[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/kawika_o_ka_pakipika/sportscardsetc/mischidden/miscellanybaseball/large/DSC04661.JPG[/IMG]

A notice of YW's death in a Bucknell newsletter in 1950
[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/kawika_o_ka_pakipika/sportscardsetc/mischidden/christymathewsonbucknell/websize/June%201951%20Bucknell%20Alumnus%20newsletter.jpg[/IMG]

Bonus scan. You could win a bar bet asking what was Matty's major in college. It was forestry.
[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/kawika_o_ka_pakipika/sportscardsetc/mischidden/christymathewsonbucknell/1902%20Bucknell%20yrbk%20Junior%20year%20foto%20pg47.jpg[/IMG]

Glad you love it David! It looks like it found a great home!
Jeff

Sold 15 postcards, let's make some more deals! Thanks to everyone who has purchased from the JB Collection!
Jeff

A few more deals made and some still to be made! Still have the HR Baker Pre-RC postcard. It's the postcard I've been asked about the most but I still have it. If you all are interested in anything shoot me a PM!
Jeff

Sent you a PM Derek! Selling the postcards and building a kick-a** comic collection with my son. Still doing the action figure thing too!
